name: Grand Harbor
role_in_state: Primary maritime trade and shipbuilding hub
culture_adjustments: stronger harbor-clan hierarchy than inland towns
multilingual mercantile pidgin common on docks
festival calendar keyed to sailing seasons and tides
greater tolerance for transient foreign crews
constraints: ritual workshops depend on scarce imported reagents
harbor depth limits size of visiting ships
high-pressure steam technology limited by state policy
notes: seasonal grain and timber transshipment point
naval militia funded by ship levies supports harbor security
salt tax partially underwrites ritual-export guilds
